name: Classic Cotton T-Shirt
description: Premium quality 100% cotton t-shirt with comfortable fit, perfect for everyday wear. Features excellent breathability, softness, and pre-shrunk fabric for lasting fit. Machine washable essential wardrobe staple.
intro: Essential wardrobe staple in premium cotton

name: Kids Cozy Hoodie
description: Super soft and warm hoodie designed specifically for kids with fun colors, comfortable fit, and durable construction. Perfect for active play, frequent washing, and keeping little adventurers cozy during outdoor activities.

name: Summer Casual Shorts
description: Lightweight and comfortable casual shorts perfect for summer days and beach outings. Made from breathable fabric with relaxed fit and practical pockets. Ideal for vacation, casual wear, and warm weather activities.

name: Premium Leather Jacket
description: Luxurious genuine leather jacket with classic styling and modern touches. Features premium hardware, comfortable lining, and timeless design that never goes out of style. Perfect investment piece for fashion-conscious individuals.

name: Premium Denim Jacket
description: Timeless denim jacket crafted from high-quality denim with classic button closure, chest pockets, and adjustable waist tabs. Perfect layering piece for any season and versatile wardrobe essential for casual styling.
intro: Timeless denim style with modern comfort

name: Comfortable Jogger Pants
description: Ultra-comfortable jogger pants made from cotton-polyester blend with elastic waistband, drawstring, and side pockets. Ideal for lounging, light workouts, and athleisure wear. Perfect combination of comfort and street style.

name: Cozy Pullover Hoodie
description: Soft and warm pullover hoodie with fleece lining, kangaroo pocket, adjustable drawstring hood, and ribbed cuffs. Perfect for casual wear, chilly days, and comfortable lounging. Essential comfort wear for all seasons.
intro: Warmth and style in perfect harmony

name: Athletic Shorts
description: Lightweight and breathable athletic shorts with moisture-wicking fabric, elastic waistband, side pockets, and quick-dry technology. Perfect for workouts, running, summer activities, and active lifestyle.

name: Vintage Graphic Tee
description: Retro-inspired graphic t-shirt with vintage wash and soft-hand print made from premium cotton blend. Perfect statement piece for casual wear, featuring comfortable fit, durability, and unique vintage aesthetic.

name: Kids Fun Adventure T-Shirt
description: Colorful and playful t-shirt designed for kids with fun adventure graphics made from soft, hypoallergenic cotton. Gentle on sensitive skin, easy care, fade-resistant colors. Perfect for active kids and everyday adventures.
intro: Adventure awaits in comfort and style

name: Elegant Blouse
description: Sophisticated and versatile blouse perfect for office and casual wear with flattering fit, subtle details, and premium fabric that drapes beautifully. Ideal for professional settings, business casual, and elegant occasions.

name: Slim Fit Chino Pants
description: Classic chino pants with modern slim fit made from premium cotton twill with stretch for comfort and mobility. Features traditional styling with contemporary cut, perfect for business casual and smart casual wear.
